title: PMS 2.0 526 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Jay Glazer, Ike Taylor, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ, and the boys chat about the Thursday Night Football game between the Packers and Cardinals, and Pat unveils his Same Game Parlay that is available exclusively at FanDuel. Joining the program to chat about everything going on at the Owners Meetings in New York and a few injury and Covid updates from tonight's game, is Fox NFL Insider and friend of the show, Jay Glazer (13:48-29:30). Later, 2x Super Bowl Champion, Pittsburgh Steelers legend, Ike Taylor joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about his thoughts on the Steelers this year, what he thinks is wrong with Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs offense, why the Packers are still going to be a major threat tonight against the Cardinals with Aaron Rodgers on field regardless of who is playing WR, Ike's thoughts on Mike Tomlin's press conference and the rumors swirling that he could potentially be eyeing the USC job, and much more (53:03-1:11:25). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
